    • ForComment

      public void ForComment(int idInteraction, int idAccount, int idPost, String content)
      This is a method. This method create a comment for a post.
      Parameters:
      idInteraction - is an integer variable. It holds id for interaction of post.
      idAccount - is an integer variable. It holds id for account which make a comment.
      idPost - is an integer variable. It holds id for post which make a comment.
      content - is an object of String. It includes a text for comment.
